snowman.name: snowman
snowman.prompt: The snowman with a scarf and a black hat

Shots.Static Shot Description: boy and snowman in his backyard.
snowman winks eye and lifts arm.
boy gasps and claps his hands.
snowman tap his foot on the snow-covered ground.
boy jumps up and starts dancing too.
snowman laughs and tosses a snowball to the boy.
snowman and boy both fall down laughing in the snow.
snowman walks back towards the tree.
